Package Sprites

Class Plane

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sprites.Plane
  • public class Plane
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the alpha verison of the plane class. It is currently a very bare-bones class, but images and more will be implemented in future versions
    Version:
    Beta
    Author:
    Nihal Ernest, Krishan Patel

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void accelerate​(double x, double y)
      accelerates the aircraft
      void afterburner​(double x)
      Increases the speed of the plane by increasing the terminal velocity of the physics shape

      Adds drag force to the plane to prevent constant velocity

      Draws the required components for the aircraft

      makes the plane shoot
      Shape getBarrel()
      Returns the shape used by the gun barrel used by the plane
      Gun getGun()
      Returns the plane's gun
      Healthbar getHealthbar()
      Returns the plane's healthbar, to use health functions such as checking whether is alive, or repairing the plane

      Returns the physics shape of the tree

      Returns the X-position of the plane
      double getY()
      Returns the Y-position of the plane

      Checks to see if the plane's position is still within the window

      Checks to see if the aircraft intersects another object
      boolean isUser()

      Moves the plane by changing its position based on velocities

      moves the plane to a specific location
      void reset()
      resets the plane to its original state and position

      Resets the plane, and sends it to a specific position

      • inBounds

        public int inBounds​(int width,
                    int height)
        Checks to see if the plane's position is still within the window
        Parameters:
        width - width of the screen
        height - height of the screen
        Returns:
        returns an int that shows where it exceeds bounds or if it's in. (0- in bounds, 1- right side, 2- Left side, 3- Below, 4- Above)
